channel.title: Possible Psychonauts Sequel?
channel.description:
So, I was playing Psychonauts earlier today, and went into Steam's overlay to look up something in the web browser, and saw [url='https://kotaku.com/5688018/psychonauts-creator-is-totally-ready-for-a-sequel']this[/url] as the newest article in the news section.
Obviously it doesn't mean that there [i]will[/i] be a sequel, but the fact that Schafer even wants to and is hopefully looking for a publisher to fund it is great news to me. Psychonauts is in my Top 3 Games of all time, so I'd be unbelievably excited for it to come out with a sequel
What do you guys think? And sorry if this is old news.

item.title: Possible Psychonauts Sequel?
item.dc:creator: CTID
item.description:
I am a grieving widow, these are my flowers. I see you are also a grieving widow, I will let you grieve.

All while air-guitarring on a bouquet of flowers.

Read full topic

item.title: Possible Psychonauts Sequel?
item.dc:creator: JollyGiant13
item.description:
“I am the milkman, my milk is delicious.”

Best quote in the whole game.

I was on “The Milkman Conspiracy” when I last played.

item.title: Possible Psychonauts Sequel?
item.dc:creator: TheOneAndOnly
item.description:
Gosh, now that I think of it, I really gotta finish Psychonauts… I got my new lappie, the game runs to smoothly

I’ve heard comments like that, CTID, so I am a bit scared of getting there >.< Last time I got up to Velvetopia, but lost my files… Gonna start again and see how the last level is

Read full topic

item.title: Possible Psychonauts Sequel?
item.dc:creator: CTID
item.description:
I also have a question for others who’ve played Psychonauts to the end. Why all the hate for the last level? It definitely wasn’t my favorite, but it was by no means difficult, and it definitely doesn’t fit anywhere near my all-time least favorite video game levels like a lot of you guys seem to think it is.

Read full topic

item.title: Possible Psychonauts Sequel?
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
Which is a damn shame. I played through a few chapters of the game not long ago on my 360. Hilarious writing and brilliant direction.

Read full topic

item.title: Possible Psychonauts Sequel?
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
Publishers are less and less willing to take risks these days, he is going to have a hard time finding a publisher

Read full topic

item.title: Possible Psychonauts Sequel?
item.dc:creator: CTID
item.description:
Well not until that article has he explicitly stated “I’m ready to make a sequel.” beforehand he’s just stated that if he were to make one, that it’d be after they were done making Brutal Legend.

Read full topic

item.title: Possible Psychonauts Sequel?
item.dc:creator: Dust
item.description:
Yeah, he has been saying for ages that he is ready for another sequel. It’s old news, but I’m still exited.

Psychonauts is badass.

Read full topic
